name: Shoot That Pizza
description:
Shoot That Pizza is an arcade pizza shooting challenge. Use three different weapons to blow up as many pizzas as you can in three minutes!

Made in evenings and weekends over the course of two weeks for the Idle Thumbs Wizard Jam. Special thanks to the Thumbs community for making such a great event. Another special thanks to the people who let me use their photos for the bonus minigame.

A-side: Shoot That Pizza

B-side: I Like the Hair (Bonus)

Credits

Art/Design/Code/Music: Ben Wilson

Additional Music Credit: Heinz Kiessling - Pizzicata Milanese
